## QUESTION 1:

```{r}
Q1<-function(Type=NULL, Value=NULL){
  Type <- 1:50
  Value <- 1:50
  dataFrame <- data.frame(Type, Value, stringsAsFactors = F)
  dataFrame[1:25,1] <- "Control"
  dataFrame[26:50, 1] <- "Treatment"
  dataFrame[1:25,2] <- rnorm(n=25, mean=10, sd=1.5)
  dataFrame[26:50,2] <- rnorm(n=25, mean=45, sd=2)
  return(dataFrame)
}
dFrame<-dataFrame
print(dFrame)
```
### QUESTION 2
```{r}
dataHead<-head(dFrame)
print(dataHead)
```
### QUESTION 3
```{r}
Anova<- aov(Value~Type, data = dFrame, projections = T, qr = T, contrasts = NULL)
print(Anova)
summary(Anova)
```
